name: Vegan Tuna Sandwich with Chickpeas
description: This vegan tuna sandwich with chickpeas is ready in no time and it's so incredibly yummy! And with the help of dried seaweed it tastes so much like the real thing!
recipeIngredient: 2  stalks of celery, chopped into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the dried seaweed with your hands and let it soak in a shallow bowl of water for about 5 minutes (1/2 cup of water should be fine). Drain and press the water out with your hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Crumble the dried seaweed with your hands and let it soak in a shallow bowl of water for about 5 minutes (1/2 cup of water should be fine). Drain and press the water out with your hands.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the chickpeas with a fork until they have a flaky texture. Stir in the celery, mayonnaise, dill, seaweed, lemon juice, and soy sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the chickpeas with a fork until they have a flaky texture. Stir in the celery, mayonnaise, dill, seaweed, lemon juice, and soy sauce. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve on whole wheat bread together with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve on whole wheat bread together with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and red onions.
